short_summary: For the Delivery of Two 6-Foot Bio Safety Enclosure CLASS II Type A2 With Telescopic support.
description: and all required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EST on the 23 November 2022. All bids submitted after 2 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. PWGSC, on behalf of Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA), is issuing this sexual Request for Proposal  for the acquisition of Two 6-Foot Bio Safety Enclosure CLASS II Type A2 With Telescopic support, including after sales services. The Requirement must be delivered in St-Hyacinthe (Quebec), as detailed in Annex A
